name: claim_referral
attributes: # [doc = " リファラル報酬を請求するが、"]
# [doc = " referral_account.owner と ctx.accounts.user.key() の照合チェックがない"]
body: let ref_acc = & mut ctx . accounts . referral_account ;
let reward_amount = ctx . accounts . config . referral_reward ;
ref_acc . total_rewards = ref_acc . total_rewards . checked_add (reward_amount) . unwrap () ;
* * ctx . accounts . user . to_account_info () . lamports . borrow_mut () += reward_amount ;
* * ctx . accounts . payout_pool . to_account_info () . lamports . borrow_mut () -= reward_amount ;

fields.name: referral_account
fields.attribute: # [account (mut)] # [doc = " 本来は #[account(has_one = owner)] を指定して所有者照合を強制すべき"]

fields.name: user
fields.attribute: # [doc = " リファラル報酬を受け取るユーザー（署名者）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: payout_pool
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 報酬支払い用のプールアカウント"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: config
fields.attribute: # [doc = " リファラル報酬量を保持する設定アカウント"]

fields.name: owner
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 本来このアカウントを所有するべきユーザーの Pubkey"]

fields.name: total_rewards
fields.attribute: # [doc = " これまでに請求した報酬の累計"]

fields.name: referral_reward
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 1 回の請求で付与される報酬量（Lamports）"]
